institution_data: The recordings were performed in the {InstitutionName}, {InstitutionAddress}.
device_info: The device used was the {ManufacturersModelName} from {ManufacturersModelName}, with serial number {DeviceSerialNumber}. The software version was {SoftwareVersions}.
device_freq_config: Power line and sampling frequencies were {PowerLineFrequency} and {SamplingFrequency} respectively.
device_channel_count: There were {MEGChannelCount} MEG channels, {MEGREFChannelCount} of which where MEG reference channels.
device_channels: The device also included {dc_EEGChannelCount}, {dc_EOGChannelCount}, {dc_ECGChannelCount} and {dc_EMGChannelCount} recorded simultaneously.
recording_properties: The experiment was recorded during {RecordingDuration} seconds {RecordingType}.
dewar_positioning: The dewar was {dw_DewarPosition} during the scan.
